otp_text:
Hello from Portfolio

Your OTP for Password Update :

%OTP%
resend_otp:
You've requested a new One-Time Password (OTP) for Portfolio. Here it is:

%OTP%

Use this OTP to complete your action. If you didn't request this OTP, please ignore this message.

If you encounter any issues or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team.
signup_email_subject: Welcome to Portfolio ! We're excited to have you on board.
signup_otp:
To Login your account, please use the following credentials is Email: %Email% And %Password%

If you encounter any issues or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team.

Thank you for choosing Portfolio. We look forward to serving you!
org_account_approve: Hello, %name% Your registration request has been approved by the administrator, you are now logged in to your account

other_free_sub_expired: Access Denied, It looks like you're trying to log in with a different access code on a device that's already linked to a free plan. For security reasons, our free plan is limited to one device per access code.
self_free_sub_expired: Access Denied, Your free plan is currently expired . Please upgrade your plan for access.
link_expired: The link is expired. Reach out to support or generate a new link.
link_inactive: The link is no longer active. Reach out to support or generate a new link.
